meanings.definition: Happening or existing without the knowledge of someone.
meanings.sent1: The surprise party was unbeknown to the birthday girl.
meanings.sent2: The thief's presence in the house was unbeknown to the homeowners.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat's unbeknown antics kept the family entertained.
meanings.sent4: The treasure hidden in the old chest remained unbeknown to all.
meanings.sent5: The secret passage in the castle was unbeknown to most visitors.

meanings.sent1: She slipped out of the room unbeknown to her siblings.
meanings.sent2: The spy moved through the crowd unbeknown to his targets.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the nuts unbeknown to the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The truth behind the legend remained unbeknown to the villagers.
meanings.sent5: The hidden camera captured the thief's actions unbeknown to him.
